headline: Why The Narrative Around BP Is Shifting After Strategy Reset And Analyst Revisions
summary: BP's latest price target revision reflects a cautiously more optimistic narrative, with a slightly higher fair value estimate grounded in growing confidence around its strategy reset and portfolio streamlining. While the discount rate has nudged up as analysts factor in lingering balance sheet and transition risks, stable revenue growth assumptions underscore that the story is more about improving risk reward than aggressive top line upgrades.
